name: Angular Translation File
summary: Learn about .XTB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: XTB files may be created from localization projects by POEditor, an online software localization program. To create an XTB file, select the Export button on the app localization language page. POEditor exports data that has been localized in the XTB file, which can be imported into Angular.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
